CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_landing', false, 'tZyOKbtBW1Y6jgOgyl3rm-ghuJUJsbLCHIgBPzIXDfk', 'v3.5.0--nyuuU2hUUKbEdQPA0pLHC5rAd7CClkbZD6ykMvAfymE', 'NuPt2AfAd4eZ4PLa4BUsLIy7mcgZoGiQXVSrkB4FuDc'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_landing; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_landing (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure

UPDATE _content_info SET ready = true WHERE id = 'checksum_landing'; -- meta
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_docs', false, '34VO9dvAPvtpqIagDKzbpgcpKTSRhud0mLOnSKb5i1E', 'v3.5.0--FvUWVZqevh6uTTqrKdttHcBvoBB_iHxYgmxTBM3lcGg', 'rDTqoBo-23R-7hqKQaDMkwz2qoYULzKjegTr-wc6bQQ'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_docs; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_docs (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "links" TEXT NULL, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure

While the visual style comes ready out of the box, your focus should be on writing content using the Markdown and ",["a",{"href":"https://content.nuxt.com/docs/files/markdown#mdc-syntax","rel":["nofollow"]},"MDC syntax"]," provided by ",["a",{"href":"https://content.nuxt.com","rel":["nofollow"]},"Nuxt Content"],"."],["p",{},"We use this theme across all our Nuxt module documentations, including:"],["card-group",{},["card",{"icon":"i-simple-icons-nuxtdotjs","target":"_blank","title":"Nuxt Image","to":"https://image.nuxt.com"},"The documentation of ",["code",{},"@nuxt/image"]],["card",{"icon":"i-simple-icons-nuxtdotjs","target":"_blank","title":"Nuxt Supabase","to":"https://supabase.nuxtjs.org"},"The documentation of ",["code",{},"@nuxt/supabase"]]],["h2",{"id":"key-features"},"Key Features"],["p",{},"This theme includes a range of features designed to improve documentation management:"],["ul",{},["li",{},["strong",{},"Powered by"]," ",["a",{"href":"https://nuxt.com","rel":["nofollow"]},["strong",{},"Nuxt 4"]],": Utilizes the latest Nuxt framework for optimal performance."],["li",{},["strong",{},"Built with"]," ",["a",{"href":"https://ui.nuxt.com","rel":["nofollow"]},["strong",{},"Nuxt UI"]],": Integrates a comprehensive suite of UI components."],["li",{},["a",{"href":"https://content.nuxt.com/usage/markdown","rel":["nofollow"]},["strong",{},"MDC Syntax"]]," ",["strong",{},"via"]," ",["a",{"href":"https://content.nuxt.com","rel":["nofollow"]},["strong",{},"Nuxt Content"]],": Supports Markdown with component integration for dynamic content."],["li",{},["a",{"href":"https://content.nuxt.com/docs/studio","rel":["nofollow"]},["strong",{},"Nuxt Studio"]]," ",["strong",{},"Compatible"],": Write and edit your content visually. This is where you can locate your medias."],["h3",{"id":"packagejson"},["code",{},"package.json"]],["p",{},"This file contains all the dependencies and scripts for your application. INSERT INTO _content_docs VALUES ('docs/1.getting-started/5.studio.md', 'Web Editor', '{"type":"minimark","value":[["h2",{"id":"introduction"},["strong",{},"Introduction"]],["p",{},"The ",["a",{"href":"https://nuxt.studio","rel":["nofollow"]},"Nuxt Studio"]," ",["strong",{},"web editor"]," is a browser-based visual interface for creating, editing, and reviewing your documentation. It provides a preview experience while keeping your work in sync with your Git repository."],["video",{":controls":"true",":loop":"true","src":"https://res.cloudinary.com/nuxt/video/upload/v1747230893/studio/wzt9zfmdvk7hgmdx3cnt.mp4"}],["prose-tip",{"to":"https://content.nuxt.com/studio"},"Learn more about Nuxt Studio in the Nuxt Content documentation."],["h2",{"id":"web-editor-vs-cli"},["strong",{},"Web Editor vs. CLI"]],["p",{},"The ",["strong",{},"web editor"]," of ",["a",{"href":"https://nuxt.studio","rel":["nofollow"]},"Nuxt Studio"]," allows you to manage your documentation entirely from your browser. There is no need for local development tools or terminal commands. It’s ideal for maintaining your docs in one centralised place, with an easy tool without any Markdown skills required."],["p",{},"The ",["strong",{},"CLI (Command Line Interface)"],", on the other hand, is a local tool designed for developers who prefer working in their own IDE."],["prose-note",{},"Both tools are fully integrated with Git, so you can switch between them as needed. Team members can choose whichever method suits their workflow best."],["h2",{"id":"two-distinct-editors"},["strong",{},"Two distinct editors"]],["p",{},"Nuxt Studio offers a versatile workspace for both developers and content writers, giving them the freedom to choose between two distinct editors for content creation and management: the ",["strong",{},"Markdown editor"]," and the ",["strong",{},"Visual editor"],"."],["p",{},"You can select your favorite editor from the settings page of your project."],["prose-note",{},"Each editor serves its own purpose, some users are used to Markdown edition, while others prefer a non-technical, visual approach. At the end, ",["strong",{},"Markdown syntax is the final output"]," for both editors."],["h2",{"id":"markdown-editor"},["strong",{},"Markdown editor"]],["p",{},"The Markdown editor in Nuxt Studio provides full control over your content, allowing you to write directly you documentation in ",["strong",{},"Markdown"]," and integrate Vue components with the ",["a",{"href":"https://content.nuxt.com/docs/files/markdown#mdc-syntax","rel":["nofollow"]},"MDC syntax"],"."],["p",{},"When your file is saved with the Markdown editor, the content is stored exactly as you''ve written it, preserving all specific syntax and formatting. This editor is ideal for users comfortable with Markdown who want precise control over the layout and structure of their content."],["h2",{"id":"visual-editor"},["strong",{},"Visual editor"]],["p",{},"The Nuxt Studio editor is heavily inspired by Notion, well known for its intuitive design and flexibility. Much like a standard text editor, the Studio editor is designed to be familiar and easy to use."],["p",{},"However, it stands out with its additional features that improve the writing experience:"],["h3",{"id":"toolbar"},["strong",{},"Toolbar"]],["p",{},"Highlight your text to reveal the toolbar, giving you access to all the standard text editing features provided by the ",["a",{"href":"/essentials/markdown-syntax"},"Markdown syntax"],":"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Title formatting"],["li",{},"Bold"],["li",{},"Italic"],["li",{},"Strike-through"],["li",{},"Code"],["li",{},"Link"],["li",{},"Class"],["li",{},"Bullet list"],["li",{},"Numerated list"]],["h3",{"id":"the-shortcut"},["strong",{},"The"]," ",["code",{},"/"]," ",["strong",{},"shortcut"]],["p",{},"Simply type ",["code",{},"/"]," anywhere in the editor to access all Studio features."],["h4",{"id":"formatting-features"},["strong",{},"Formatting features"]],["ul",{},["li",{},"Title formatting"],["li",{},"Line break"],["li",{},"Horizontal rule"],["li",{},"Code-block"],["li",{},"Paragraph"],["li",{},"Bold & italic"]],["h4",{"id":"components"},["strong",{},"Components"]],["p",{},"One of Studio''s standout features is its ability to integrate and customize any complex component directly within the editor."],["p",{},"In other terms, all ",["a",{"href":"/essentials/components"},"Nuxt UI components"]," are usable and can be integrated directly from the editor. An editor can also tweak the component properties, slots and styles."],["prose-note",{},"You can also create custom components and let the user integrate them from the visual editor."],["p",{},"Just type ",["code",{},"/"]," to access the list of all the components available."],["h4",{"id":"images"},["strong",{},"Images"]],["p",{},"Using the ",["code",{},"/"],"shortcut, you can quickly insert an image by selecting the ",["code",{},"Image"]," option. A modal will open to let you choose the media you want to insert."],["p",{},"From the media modal, you can set the ",["strong",{},"alt attribute"]," for SEO and accessibility purpose."],["h4",{"id":"videos"},["strong",{},"Videos"]],["p",{},"Using the ",["code",{},"/"]," shortcut, you can quickly insert a video by selecting the ",["code",{},"Video"]," choice and filling up the Video URL."],["p",{},"As soon as a video is added, a tab will automatically open with all the props field ",["strong",{},"available by default"],", for you to fill out the URL and customize your media."],["h2",{"id":"live-preview"},["strong",{},"Live Preview"]],["p",{},"Once your documentation is deployed, it provides a live preview feature that lets you instantly see updates to your project."],["p",{},"We''re using your production website to override contents and display the new visual. This is why we need the URL to be set in the ",["strong",{},"deploy"]," section."],["p",{},"When you are editing your website with Studio, the live preview can be displayed on the right part of your screen. You get an instant feedback when typing. It syncs the preview based on your draft updates."],["h2",{"id":"making-changes"},["strong",{},"Making Changes"]],["p",{},"To edit your documentation:"],["ol",{},["li",{},["strong",{},"Browse files"]," using the file explorer."],["li",{},["strong",{},"Open a file"]," by clicking on it."],["li",{},["strong",{},"Edit content"]," in either visual or Markdown mode. All edits are automatically saved as drafts."],["li",{},["strong",{},"Preview your changes"]," to see how they’ll appear when published."]],["h2",{"id":"publishing-changes"},["strong",{},"Publishing Changes"]],["p",{},"When you’re ready to publish:"],["ul",{},["li",{},"Click the ",["strong",{},"Publish"]," button in the top-right corner of the editor."],["li",{},"Your changes will be pushed directly to your deployment branch and go live immediately."]]],"toc":{"title":"","searchDepth":2,"depth":2,"links":[{"id":"introduction","depth":2,"text":"Introduction"},{"id":"web-editor-vs-cli","depth":2,"text":"Web Editor vs. CLI"},{"id":"two-distinct-editors","depth":2,"text":"Two distinct editors"},{"id":"markdown-editor","depth":2,"text":"Markdown editor"},{"id":"visual-editor","depth":2,"text":"Visual editor","children":[{"id":"toolbar","depth":3,"text":"Toolbar"},{"id":"the-shortcut","depth":3,"text":"The / shortcut"}]},{"id":"live-preview","depth":2,"text":"Live Preview"},{"id":"making-changes","depth":2,"text":"Making Changes"},{"id":"publishing-changes","depth":2,"text":"Publishing Changes"}]}}', 'Build your documentation using Nuxt Studio web editor', 'md', NULL, '{}', '{"icon":"i-lucide-mouse-pointer-2"}', '/getting-started/studio', '{"title":"Web Editor","description":"Build your documentation using Nuxt Studio web editor"}', '1.getting-started/5.studio', 'eUHHImiJIqGTcZ5d3oEHLERqqSM8zfw63YXR1WvQhgo'); -- eUHHImiJIqGTcZ5d3oEHLERqqSM8zfw63YXR1WvQhgo
INSERT INTO _content_docs VALUES ('docs/1.getting-started/6.migration.md', 'Migration', '{"type":"minimark","value":[["h2",{"id":"migrating-to-docus"},["strong",{},"Migrating to Docus"]],["p",{},"Already using a Markdown-based solution for your documentation? Whether it’s ",["strong",{},"Docus v1"],", the ",["strong",{},"Nuxt UI docs template"],", or another static site setup, migrating to Docus is simple and straightforward."],["p",{},"Docus offers a clean and maintainable solution with a single dependency: the Docus library itself. There’s no need to manage multiple dependencies. With everything built-in and maintained together, keeping your documentation up to date is easier than ever."],["p",{},"To migrate, just move your existing Markdown files into the ",["code",{},"content/"]," directory of the Docus starter."],["p",{},"From there, you have two scenarios:"],["ul",{},["li",{},["strong",{},"If your current docs already use Nuxt Content and the MDC syntax"],", make sure the components used in your content exist in Nuxt UI. If any components are missing, you can easily create your own custom ones."],["li",{},["strong",{},"If you’re using standard Markdown"],", you can copy your files as is. Then, enhance your documentation progressively using the ",["a",{"href":"https://docus.dev/essentials/components","rel":["nofollow"]},"built-in components"]," provided by Nuxt UI."]],["p",{},"Once your content has been moved to the ",["code",{},"content/"]," folder, you can go through the ",["a",{"href":"https://docus.dev/concepts/configuration","rel":["nofollow"]},"configuration section"]," to easily customize your app."],["p",{},"Docus is designed to focus on writing content, so if you''re already using Markdown, you can easily switch to it."]],"toc":{"title":"","searchDepth":2,"depth":2,"links":[{"id":"migrating-to-docus","depth":2,"text":"Migrating to Docus"}]}}', ' How to migrate your documentation from an existing Markdown solution to Docus', 'md', NULL, '{}', '{"icon":"i-lucide-replace"}', '/getting-started/migration', '{"title":"Migration","description":" How to migrate your documentation from an existing Markdown solution to Docus"}', '1.getting-started/6.migration', '5-9rNi1IV3MO174MuEFr-KXxFX7ZWuQZIG8r3ifsHlQ'); -- 5-9rNi1IV3MO174MuEFr-KXxFX7ZWuQZIG8r3ifsHlQ

related items in a structured, readable format. Markdown supports unordered, ordered, and nested lists for various content needs."],["h3",{"id":"unordered"},"Unordered"],["p",{},"Use unordered lists for items without a specific sequence. Start each item with a ",["code",{},"-"]," symbol."],["code-preview",{"className":["[&>div]:*:my-0"]},["ul",{},["li",{},"I''m a list item."],["li",{},"I''m another list item."],["li",{},"I''m the last list item."]],["template",{"v-slot:code":""},["pre",{"className":"language-mdc shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"- I''m a list item.\n- I''m another list item.\n- I''m the last list item.\n","language":"mdc","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"-"],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"}," I''m a list item.\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"-"],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"}," I''m another list item.\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"-"],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"}," I''m the last list item.\n"]]]]]],["h3",{"id":"ordered"},"Ordered"],["p",{},"Use ordered lists when item order matters, like steps in a process. Start each item with a number."],["code-preview",{"className":["[&>div]:*:my-0"]},["ol",{},["li",{},"I''m a list item."],["li",{},"I''m another list item."],["li",{},"I''m the last list item."]],["template",{"v-slot:code":""},["pre",{"className":"language-mdc shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"1. I''m the last list item.\n","language":"mdc","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"1."],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"}," I''m a list item.\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"2."],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"}," I''m another list item.\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"3."],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"}," I''m the last list item.\n"]]]]]],["h3",{"id":"nested"},"Nested"],["p",{},"Create hierarchical lists with sub-items for complex structures. Indent sub-items by four spaces for nesting."],["code-preview",{"className":["[&>div]:*:my-0"]},["ul",{},["li",{},"I''m a list item.",["ul",{},["li",{},"I''m a nested list item."],["li",{},"I''m another nested list item."]]],["li",{},"I''m another list item."]],["template",{"v-slot:code":""},["pre",{"className":"language-mdc shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"- I''m a list item.\n  - I''m a nested list item.\n  - I''m another nested list item.\n- I''m another list item.\n","language":"mdc","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"-"],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"}," I''m a list item.\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"  -"],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"}," I''m a nested list item.\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"  -"],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"}," I''m another nested list item.\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"-"],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"}," I''m another list item.\n"]]]]]],["h2",{"id":"tables"},"Tables"],["p",{},"Present structured data in rows and columns clearly. properties."],["code-preview",{"className":["[&>div]:*:my-0","[&>div]:*:w-full"]},["table",{},["thead",{},["tr",{},["th",{},"Prop"],["th",{},"Default"],["th",{},"Type"]]],["tbody",{},["tr",{},["td",{},["code",{},"name"]],["td",{}],["td",{},["code",{},"string"]]],["tr",{},["td",{},["code",{},"size"]],["td",{},["code",{},"md"]],["td",{},["code",{},"string"]]],["tr",{},["td",{},["code",{},"color"]],["td",{},["code",{},"neutral"]],["td",{},["code",{},"string"]]]]],["template",{"v-slot:code":""},["pre",{"className":"language-mdc |\n"]]]]]],["h2",{"id":"blockquotes"},"Blockquotes"],["p",{},"Highlight important quotations, citations, or emphasized text. Blockquotes visually distinguish quoted content."],["h3",{"id":"singleline"},"Singleline"],["p",{},"Single-line blockquotes are best for short, impactful quotes or citations that fit within a single line. To create a single-line blockquote, add a ",["code",{},">"]," in front of a paragraph. Ideal for short and impactful quotes."],["code-preview",{"className":["[&>div]:*:my-0"]},["p",{},"Nuxt UI is a collection of Vue components, composables and utils built on top of Reka UI, oriented on structure and layout and designed to be used as building blocks for your app."],["template",{"v-slot:code":""},["pre",{"className":"language-mdc shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter building blocks for your app.\n","language":"mdc","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sCNwf"},">"],["span",{"class":"s7zQu"}," Nuxt UI app.\n"]]]]]],["h3",{"id":"multiline"},"Multiline"],["p",{},"Multi-line blockquotes are suitable for longer quotes or when you need to include multiple paragraphs within a single quotation."],["code-preview",{"className":["[&>div]:*:my-0"]},["p",{},"Nuxt UI is a collection of Vue components, composables and utils built on top of Reka UI, oriented on structure and layout and Vue applications with Nuxt UI.\n","language":"mdc","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sCNwf"},">"],["span",{"class":"s7zQu"}," Nuxt UI is a collection of Vue components, composables and utils built on top of Reka UI, oriented on structure and layout and designed to be used as building blocks for your \"./.nuxt/tsconfig.json\"\n}\n","filename":"tsconfig.json","language":"json","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"{\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"}," shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"# Nuxt 4 Minimal Starter\n\nLook at the [Nuxt 4 documentation](https://nuxt.com/docs/getting-started/introduction) to learn more.\n\n## Setup\n\nMake sure to install the dependencies:\n\n```bash\n# npm\nnpm install\n\n# pnpm\npnpm install\n\n# yarn\nyarn install\n\n# bun\nbun install\n```\n\n## Development Server\n\nStart the development server on `http://localhost:3000`:\n\n```bash\n# npm\nnpm run dev\n\n# pnpm\npnpm run dev\n\n# yarn\nyarn dev\n\n# bun\nbun run dev\n```\n\n## Production\n\nBuild the application for production:\n\n```bash\n# npm\nnpm run build\n\n# pnpm\npnpm run build\n\n# yarn\nyarn build\n\n# bun\nbun run build\n```\n\nLocally preview production build:\n\n```bash\n# npm\nnpm run preview\n\n# pnpm\npnpm run preview\n\n# yarn\nyarn preview\n\n# bun\nbun run preview\n```\n\nCheck out the [deployment documentation](https://nuxt.com/docs/getting-started/deployment) for more information.\n","filename":"README.md","language":"md","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"# ",["code",{},"code-preview"]," is ideal for interactive examples and demonstrating code results.\nWrite the code to be previewed in a the ",["code",{},"default"]," slot and the actual code in the ",["code",{},"code"]," slot."],["code-preview",{"className":["[&>div]:*:my-0","[&>div]:*:w-full"],"label":"Preview"},["code-preview",{"className":["[&>div]:*:my-0"]},["code",{},"inline code"],["template",{"v-slot:code":""},["pre",{"className":"language-mdc shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"`inline code`\n","language":"mdc","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"`"],["span",{"class":"sfazB"},"inline code"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"`\n"]]]]]],["template",{"v-slot:code":""},["pre",{"className":"language-mdc shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"::code-preview\n`inline code`\n\n#code\n```mdc\n`inline code`\n```\n::\n","language":"mdc","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"::"],["span",{"class":"swJcz"},"code-preview\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"`"],["span",{"class":"sfazB"},"inline code"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"`\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{"class":"spNyl"},"#code\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{"class":"sfazB"},"```"],["span",{"class":"sJsPd"},"mdc\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":6},["span",{"class":"sJsPd"},"`inline code`\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":7},["span",{"class":"sfazB"},"```\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":8},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"::\n"]]]]]],["h3",{"id":"codecollapse"},["code",{},"CodeCollapse"]],["p",{},"Use ",["code",{},"code-collapse"]," for long code blocks to keep pages clean. ",["code",{},"code-collapse"]," allows users to expand code blocks only when needed, improving readability."],["code-preview",{"className":["[&>div]:*:my-0","[&>div]:*:w-full"]},["code-collapse",{"className":["[&>div]:my-0"]},["pre",{"className":"language-css shiki shiki-themes shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"::code-collapse\n\n```css [main.css]\n@import \"tailwindcss\";\n@import \"@nuxt/ui\";\n\n@theme {\n  --font-sans: ''Public Sans'', sans-serif;\n\n  --breakpoint-3xl: 1920px;\n\n  --color-green-50: #EFFDF5;\n  --color-green-100: #D9FBE8;\n  --color-green-200: #B3F5D1;\n  --color-green-300: #75EDAE;\n  --color-green-400: #00DC82;\n  --color-green-500: #00C16A;\n  --color-green-600: #00A155;\n  --color-green-700: #007F45;\n  --color-green-800: #016538;\n  --color-green-900: #0A5331;\n  --color-green-950: #052E16;\n}\n```\n\n::\n","language":"mdc","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"::"],["span",{"class":"swJcz"},"code-collapse\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"sfazB"},"```"],["span",{"class":"sJsPd"},"css [main.css]\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{"class":"s7zQu"},"@import"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"}," \""],["span",{"class":"sfazB"},"tailwindcss"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"\""],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},";\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{"class":"s7zQu"},"@import"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"}," \""],["span",{"class":"sfazB"},"@nuxt/ui"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"\""],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},";\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":6},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":7},["span",{"class":"s7zQu"},"@theme"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"}," {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":8},["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"},"  --font-sans: ''Public Sans''"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},","],["span",{"class":"swJcz"}," sans-serif"],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"},";\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":9},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":10},["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"}," INSERT INTO _content_docs VALUES ('docs/2.essentials/3.components.md', 'Markdown Components', '{"type":"minimark","value":[["p",{},"Prose components are replacements for HTML typography tags. They provide a simple way to customize your UI when using Markdown."],["p",{},["strong",{},"Docus and Nuxt UI"]," provides a set of styled and beautiful prose components to help you write your documentation using the ",["a",{"href":"https://content.nuxt.com/docs/files/markdown#mdc-syntax","rel":["nofollow"]},"MDC syntax"],"."],["prose-note",{"to":"https://ui.nuxt.com/getting-started"},"This page highlights only the prose components best suited for writing documentation. However, you can use ",["strong",{},"any Nuxt UI component"]," in your Markdown. For the full list of available components, visit the Nuxt UI documentation."],["h3",{"id":"accordion"},["code",{},"Accordion"]],["p",{},"Use the ",["code",{},"accordion"]," and ",["code",{},"accordion-item"]," components to display an ",["a",{"href":"https://ui.nuxt.com/components/accordion","rel":["nofollow"]},"Accordion"]," in your content."],["tabs",{},["tabs-item",{"icon":"i-lucide-eye","label":"Preview"},["accordion",{},["accordion-item",{"icon":"i-lucide-circle-help","label":"What is Docus and what are its key features??"},"Docus is a fully integrated documentation solution built with Nuxt UI. It''s a theme based on the UI documentation template that provides a ready-to-use visual. User can focus on content using Markdown and MDC syntax."],["accordion-item",{"icon":"i-lucide-circle-help","label":"How do I get started with Docus?"},"The only thing you need to start a Docus project is a ",["code",{},"content/"]," folder. target"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},":"],["span",{"class":"sfazB"}," _blank\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":29},["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"},"  ---\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":30},["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"},"  A documentation with ::\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":42},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":43},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},":::\n"]]]]]],["h3",{"id":"collapsible"},["code",{},"Collapsible"]],["p",{},"Wrap your content with the ",["code",{},"collapsible"]," component to display a ",["a",{"href":"https://ui.nuxt.com/components/collapsible","rel":["nofollow"]},"Collapsible"]," in your content."],["tabs",{},["tabs-item",{"icon":"i-lucide-eye","label":"Preview","className":["my-5"]},["collapsible",{},["table",{},["thead",{},["tr",{},["th",{},"Prop"],["th",{},"Default"],["th",{},"Type"]]],["tbody",{},["tr",{},["td",{},["code",{},"name"]],["td",{}],["td",{},["code",{},"string"]]],["tr",{},["td",{},["code",{},"size"]],["td",{},["code",{},"md"]],["td",{},["code",{},"string"]]],["tr",{},["td",{},["code",{},"color"]],["td",{},["code",{},"neutral"]],["td",{},["code",{},"string"]]]]]]],["tabs-item",{"icon":"i-lucide-code","label":"Code"},["pre",{"className":"language-mdc shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"::collapsible\n\n| Prop    | Default   | Type                     |\n|---------|-----------|--------------------------|\n| `name`  |           | `string`{lang=\"ts-type\"} |\n| `size`  | `md`      | `string`{lang=\"ts-type\"} |\n| `color` | `neutral` | `string`{lang=\"ts-type\"} |\n\n::\n","language":"mdc","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"::"],["span",{"class":"swJcz"},"collapsible\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"},"| "],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"`"],["span",{"class":"sfazB"},"string"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"`"],["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"},"{lang=\"ts-type\"} and ",["code",{},"FieldGroup"]],["p",{},"A ",["code",{},"field"],"is a prop or parameter to display in your content. You can group them by ",["code",{},"field-group"]," in a list."],["tabs",{},["tabs-item",{"icon":"i-lucide-eye","label":"Preview","className":["my-5"]},["field-group",{"className":["my-0"]},["field",{"name":"analytics","type":"boolean"},"Default to ",["code",{},"false"]," - Enables analytics for your project (coming soon)."],["field",{"name":"blob","type":"boolean"},"Default to ",["code",{},"false"]," - Enables blob storage to store static assets, such as images, videos and more."],["field",{"name":"cache","type":"boolean"},"Default to ",["code",{},"false"]," - Enables cache storage to cache your server route responses or functions using Nitro''s ",["code",{},"cachedEventHandler"]," and ",["code",{},"cachedFunction"]],["field",{"name":"database","type":"boolean"},"Default to ",["code",{},"false"]," - Enables SQL database to store your application''s data."]]],["tabs-item",{"icon":"i-lucide-code","label":"Code"},["pre",{"className":"language-mdc shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"::field-group\n  ::field{name=\"analytics\" type=\"boolean\"}\n    Default to `false` - Enables analytics for your project (coming soon).\n  ::\n\n  ::field{name=\"blob\" type=\"boolean\"}\n    Default to `false` - Enables blob storage to store static assets, such as images, videos and more.\n  ::\n\n  ::field{name=\"cache\" type=\"boolean\"}\n    Default to `false` - Enables cache storage to cache your server route responses or functions using Nitro''s `cachedEventHandler` and `cachedFunction`\n  ::\n\n  ::field{name=\"database\" type=\"boolean\"}\n    Default to `false` - Enables SQL database to store your application''s data.\n  ::\n::\n","language":"mdc","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"::"],["span",{"class":"swJcz"},"field-group\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"}," steps."],["p",{},"Use the ",["code",{},"level"]," prop to define which heading will be used for the steps."],["tabs",{},["tabs-item",{"icon":"i-lucide-eye","label":"Preview","className":["my-5"]},["steps",{"level":"4"},["h4",{"id":"start-a-fresh-new-project"},"Start a fresh new project"],["pre",{"className":"language-bash shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"npx nuxi init -t github:nuxt-content/docus\n","filename":"Terminal","language":"bash","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sBMFI"},"npx"],["span",{"class":"sfazB"}," CLI to run your dev server"],["pre",{"className":"language-bash shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"docus dev\n","filename":"Terminal","language":"bash","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sBMFI"},"docus"],["span",{"class":"sfazB"}," dev\n"]]]]]],["tabs-item",{"icon":"i-lucide-code","label":"Code"},["pre",{"className":"language-mdc shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight","code":"::steps{level=\"4\"}\n  #### Start a fresh new project\n  \n  ```bash [Terminal]\n  npx nuxi init -t github:nuxt-content/docus\n  ```\n  \n  #### Run docus CLI to run your dev server\n  \n  ```bash [Terminal]\n  docus dev\n  ```\n::\n","language":"mdc","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"::"],["span",{"class":"swJcz"},"steps"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"{"],["span",{"class":"spNyl"},"level"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"="],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"\""],["span",{"class":"sfazB"},"4"],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"\""],["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"}\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"sMK4o"},"  #### "],["span",{"class":"sBMFI"},"Start a fresh new project\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"},"  \n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{"class":"sfazB"}," your dev server\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":9},["span",{"class":"sTEyZ"},"  \n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":10},["span",{"class":"sfazB"},"  ```"],["span",{"class":"sJsPd"},"bash
